A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything George Lucas and even JJ Abrams has done with the Star Wars movies to date have been completely thrown out the window\, which creates huge plot holes in favour of selling toys and expanded stories via comics\, books\, games and spin offs to fill in the gaps. The movie completely mistreats the legacy cast and stories already told in the universe\, and doesn’t answer questions from the first. Overall disappointing\, it is clear that changing director and writer mid way through a trilogy who has a different vision was not a good idea.
